attributes.action: CHARGE GORDON BROWN AND HIS CABINET WITH THEFT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS GOVERNMENT HAS TO GO. THEY HAVE PROVED TIME AND TIME AGAIN THAT THEY ARE INCABLE OF DOING THEIR JOBS. THE WHOLE OF THE COUNTRY NOW SEES THEM AS GREEDY THIEVES. THE POLICE SHOULD BE CHARGING EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THEM WITH THEFT. TAXPAYERS ARE KEEPING THESE THIEVES IN LUXURY AND IT MAKES ME SICK TO MY STOMACH THAT MY TAX BUYS PORNO MOVIES, TAMPAX AND 5 PENCE BAGS.HOW CAN ANY OF YOU SHOW YOUR FACES IN PUBLIC EVER AGAIN.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister and Government do not control the pay or allowances of MPs - the current system is administered by the House of Commons. Therefore the Number 10 website can not accept any petitions relating to MPs’ expenses.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
